headline: Blackstone Buys Ritz-Carlton Okinawa as Japan Tourism Booms
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Blackstone Inc. has bought a Ritz-Carlton resort in Okinawa and is purchasing another hotel on the Japanese island in a deal worth about ¥20 billion ($130 million), according to people with knowledge of the matter.
